SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.playerReleted

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.playerReleted.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Player extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents a player in the game. It contains the player's nickname, the player's codex, the player's hand, the player's pawn color and the player's state.
See Also:

      public void playCard(Placement placement)
      This method plays a card in the user's codex it checks if the card is a valid card to play if not it throws an exception adds the card to the user's codex and removes it from the user's hand
      Parameters:
      placement - the placement of the card to play
